In England, in the seven days to 03 December, there were 278,956 new confirmed cases (493.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 26 November, there were 250,165 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 12% (28,791 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 08 December is 9,000,391 (15,915.8 cases per 100,000 population).
